text: iphyses of the metacarpals - Radial bowing - Retrognathia - Short 1st metacarpal - Short distal phalanx of finger - Slender long bone - Sloping forehead - Sparse scalp hair - Tibial bowing - Type II diabetes mellitus - Ulnar bowing - Upslanted palpebral fissure - The Human Phenotype Ontology (HPO) has collected information on how often a sign or symptom occurs in a condition.
